Package imagingbook.lib.pdf

Class CoreFontMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lowagie.text.pdf.DefaultFontMapper
      • imagingbook.lib.pdf.CoreFontMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.lowagie.text.pdf.FontMapper
    public class CoreFontMapper
extends com.lowagie.text.pdf.DefaultFontMapper
    An implementation of FontMapper that substitutes unknown fonts with embedded core fonts (Type1).

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.lowagie.text.pdf.DefaultFontMapper

    • Method Detail

      • addKeyMonospaced

        public boolean addKeyMonospaced​(java.lang.String key)
        Adds the logical name of a font to be treated as monospaced. All such fonts will be replaced by Courier in the PDF.
        Parameters:
        key - the logical font name
        Returns:
        true if insertion was successful

      • addKeySerif

        public boolean addKeySerif​(java.lang.String key)
        Adds the logical name of a font to be treated as a serif font. All such fonts will be replaced by Times in the PDF.
        Parameters:
        key - the logical font name
        Returns:
        true if insertion was successful
